methods.close: Free resources associated with this loader.
methods.getAvailableScriptDisplayPaths:
Gets the display paths available from this loader when it was in the specified state.

*Overload 1*  
  :return: (java.util.Set<java.lang.String>) The display paths currently available from this loader.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param state: (io.deephaven.engine.util.scripts.ScriptPathLoaderState) - The state of the loader to use when retrieving the list.
  :return: (java.util.Set<java.lang.String>) A list of all display paths available when the loader was in the specified state.
methods.getScriptBodyByDisplayPath:
Get the specified script at the specified state.

*Overload 1*  
  :param displayPath: (java.lang.String) - The display path to load a script for.
  :return: (java.lang.String) The body of the requested script.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param displayPath: (java.lang.String) - The display path to the script.
  :param state: (io.deephaven.engine.util.scripts.ScriptPathLoaderState) - The state of the loader.
  :return: (java.lang.String) The script at displayPath at the specified state.
methods.getScriptBodyByRelativePath:
Get the specified script at the specified state.

*Overload 1*  
  :param relativePath: (java.lang.String) - The relative path to load a script for.
  :return: (java.lang.String) The body of the requested script.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param relativePath: (java.lang.String) - The relative path to the script.
  :param state: (io.deephaven.engine.util.scripts.ScriptPathLoaderState) - The state of the loader.
  :return: (java.lang.String) The script at relativePath at the specified state.
methods.getState:
Get the current state of this ScriptPathLoader.

:return: (io.deephaven.engine.util.scripts.ScriptPathLoaderState) A ScriptPathLoaderState or null if this loader is stateless.
methods.lock:
Acquire a read lock. Use before invoking any of the get* methods, and hold for as long as consistency is required
 for this loader.
methods.refresh: Refresh the loader internally. Will respect existing read locks.
methods.unlock: Release a previously acquired read lock.

text: An interface that defines a method of loading scripts from some source.
